BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: ESQL: Report original_types (#124913) Adds the `original_types` to the description of ESQL's `unsupported` fields. This looks like: ``` { "name" : "a", "type" : "unsupported", "original_types" : [ "long", "text" ] } ``` for union types. And like: ``` { "name" : "a", "type" : "unsupported", "original_types" : [ "date_range" ] } ``` for truly unsupported types. This information is useful for the UI. For union types it can suggest that users append a cast.
